annonsrubrik: Backend Developers to Videoslots in Stockholm
annonstext:
Do you love writing quality code? We are recruiting Backend Developers to the recently started Development Team in Stockholm. If you have a couple of years’ experiences and want to work in a cross functional development teams and drive the continuous improvement of the products using agile methodologies – this is the right opportunity for you! Videoslots are inherently a curious team and are always on the lookout for new technologies which could potentially be incorporated in the stack.

OM TJÄNSTEN 
Videoslots were born in 2011 as a result of a handful of entrepreneurs who not only had a knack for entertaining others but also an affinity with the iGaming industry. They teamed up and went about building an industry leader, setting the bar to an all-new high. Now in just under nine years they now offer over 4,000 games from 134 different game providers and they’re set to keep on growing! Naturally, they can't do all of this as well as all the exciting things they have lined up for the years to follow without the living legends that make our business the success it is today.

The position is located in Videoslots new office in Stockholm. We want to create an inclusive culture where all forms of diversity are seen. We believe that a workplace free from discrimination and full of different perspectives are key factors for team satisfaction and for an excellent customer experience. We welcome applicants from all walks of life willing to be a part of part of an entrepreneurial start-up office in Stockholm!

You are offered  

* Smashing benefits as flexi-time, professional development and private health insurance. 
* Working at Videoslots you will work in a creative and flexible work environment. You will be a part of a culture where teamwork and inclusion are leading the way forward. Every employee is important for the company’s success and you will always have an impact of your work.
* Work with new development in an agile environment (Scrum)

ARBETSUPPGIFTER 
As a Backend Developer, you will be working on in-house projects: designing features, writing code, performing code reviews, solving problems, tracking down bugs, and delivering stable and well-written solutions. You will form part of a cross-functional development team where the team owns and drives the continuous improvement of our products using agile methodologies.
Our backend is powered by a LEMP stack, GraphQL and we rely on Vue.js for our frontend. They are inherently a curious team and are always on the lookout for new technologies that could potentially be incorporated into the stack.

* Design and develop new Backend features
* Perform functional requirements analysis
* Work closely with other developers, QA, and product teams
* Help track requests, issues, work progress, and any other changes using our project management tools
* Provide estimates and technical documentation on request
* Manage individual project priorities, deadlines, and deliverables
* Work in collaboration with external partners when required

VI SÖKER DIG SOM 
* Videoslots is an international organization, so we expect written and verbal communication skills in English

* You have experience in a comparable software development role, and you master PHP, Java or .Net as a programming language
* You have good knowledge of REST or GraphQL web services
* You are proficient with development in Linux environments

Skills of awesomeness:

* Proven Laravel experience 
* Experience in iGaming 
* Having a degree in Information Technology or another related field 

As a person you are:

* Good co-operations ability
* Thorough
* Self-reliant 
* Solutions-oriented 

Other information  

* Start: According to agreement, preferably March-April 
* Work extent: Fulltime, permanent position
* Location: Stockholm
* Contact information: This recruitment process is conducted by Academic Work. It is a request from Videoslots that all questions regarding the position is handled by Academic Work.

INFORMATION OM FÖRETAGET 
Read more here.
